_comment.semi: Add semicolons at the end of statements
_comment.trailingComma: Add trailing commas wherever possible (ES5 syntax)
_comment.singleQuote: Use single quotes instead of double quotes
_comment.printWidth: Line length that the printer will wrap on
_comment.tabWidth: Number of spaces per indentation level
_comment.useTabs: Indent lines with tabs instead of spaces
_comment.bracketSpacing: Print spaces between brackets in object literals
_comment.arrowParens: Include parentheses around a sole arrow function parameter
_comment.jsxBracketSameLine: Put > on the last line instead of at a new line
_comment.jsxSingleQuote: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in JSX
